thread.section_title: NOW FINANCE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NOW FINANCE | www.nowfinance.com.au
thread.title: Syed Quadri
thread.title_full: NOW FINANCE reviewed by Syed Quadri

author: Syed Quadri
title: Syed Quadri
text:
What a great expereince with great company like now finance from the officer tina and manager jason, from the 1st contact till the settlement of my loan its been a great positive experience.
I found that now finance take time to look after their customers take privacy and all info to ensure they deal with right people and i was very happy with the outcome as i have refered now finance to my community friends.
great work jason and tina and the entire settlement team and loan dept
thank you
much appreciated
syed quadri
